document.full_text: three people were killed and 90 wounded after rival clans clashed over access to jobs in the central tunisian mining town of metlaoui, the interior ministry said saturday.
document.title: three dead in clashes over jobs in tunisian town
lines_and_colors: three people were killed and 90 wounded after rival clans clashed over access to jobs in the central tunisian mining town of metlaoui, the interior ministry said saturday.
